Step 1 Cut green capsicum, pickled gherkins and pickled onions into small pieces. Halve the black olives. Put all these into a mixing bowl. Tear lettuce and add. Add boiled corn.

 Step 2 For the dressing mix mayonnaise, tomato ketchup, chilli-vinegar sauce and mix. Break half the paneer into small pieces and add.

 Step 3 Add 2-3 tbsps dressing and toss the salad ensuring that all the vegetables are well coated with the dressing. Break the remaining paneer and add. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.
